projects.name: troog
projects.description:
Sync your Trello boards with Google Calendar.

Automatically create Google Calendar events for your Trello cards.

projects.name: WAILto
projects.description: WAILto (or What Am I Listening To) is a way to analyze your music listening. Learn about your own music trends and history.
projects.tech: Node, React, React Hooks API, PostgreSQL, HTML, SCSS

projects.name: outwork
projects.description:
Log your workouts.

Allows mobile-friendly data entry for easy workout tracking.

projects.name: HUB
projects.description:
HUB is your own personal wiki: you can maintain notes, text yourself reminders, and more.

Full markdown and SMS-upload support make HUB a lightweight, easy solution to digital clutter.
projects.tech: Node, React, Webhooks, MongoDB, HTML, CSS
